page.title: 07AMENITIES
page.content: Today, most of our time was spent in Low Hesket. We arrived outside the Rose and Crown Inn, which is on the main A6 road. There is a small Post Office and Shop just up the road from the Inn. The shop mainly sells sweets and very few groceries. There is also a Police House where the Policeman lives with his family. We have seen about five farms which are all set back off the road. Low Hesket has a Primary School which is very small. We have only seen two buses today; one going to Penrith and the other one coming back. The number of the buses was 615. There is a public footpath leading to Southwaite which is about two miles away.
